methods.name: public Builder setId(@NonNull String id)
methods.comment: Sets the ID of this {@link Action}

methods.name: public Builder setLabel(@NonNull CharSequence label)
methods.comment: Sets the label of this {@link Action}.

methods.name: public Builder setPendingIntent(@NonNull PendingIntent pendingIntent)
methods.comment: Sets the {@link PendingIntent} to be sent when this {@link Action} is taken.

methods.name: public Builder setWillResolve(boolean willResolve)
methods.comment:
* Sets whether this action will resolve the issue when executed. Defaults to {@code
             * false}.
             *
             * @see #willResolve()

methods.name: public Builder setIsInFlight(boolean inFlight)
methods.comment:
* Sets a boolean that indicates whether this action is currently being executed (i.e.
             * the user clicked on a button that triggered this action, and now the Safety Center is
             * waiting for the action's result). Defaults to {@code false}.
             *
             * @see #isInFlight()

methods.name: public Builder setSuccessMessage(@Nullable CharSequence successMessage)
methods.comment:
* Sets or clears the optional success message to be displayed when this {@link Action}
             * completes.

methods.name: public Builder setConfirmationDialogDetails(@Nullable ConfirmationDialogDetails confirmationDialogDetails)
methods.comment:
* Sets the optional data to be displayed in the confirmation dialog prior to launching
             * the {@link PendingIntent} when the action is clicked on.

methods.name: public Action build()
methods.comment: Creates the {@link Action} defined by this {@link Builder}.
